embed.title: Donate
embed.description:
EssentialsX is provided completely free-of-charge. If you'd like to support the EssentialsX project, you can make a recurring donation on [Patreon](https://www.patreon.com/essentialsx).

If you'd prefer to make a one-off donation, you can support us on [Ko-fi](https://ko-fi.com/essentialsx).

If you're not able to donate, we'd really appreciate if you could take the time to write a review on our [Spigot](https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/essentialsx.9089/) page, or give us a star on [GitHub](https://github.com/EssentialsX/Essentials). Every little helps!
